rules_text:
Flying 
Ward–Discard a card.
You may have this creature enter as a copy of a creature card in your graveyard not named Weft Dancer, except it has flying and “Ward–Discard a card.”
notes:
A control deck that plays many instant-speed answers until it can reanimate a big threat.
